data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 207 believers in the state of Agri.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Agri, Turkey

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 207 believers living in Agri, Turkey.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary: On average, 33 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Agri, Turkey.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help your children in Agri, Turkey find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Agri, Turkey humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Uzbek, Southern people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Uzbek, Southern people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Uzbek, Southern people is yours.
Spirit, protect the overcomers in Agri, Turkey, so that they will one day sit with Jesus on His throne.
data.verse: He who overcomes, I will give to him to sit down with me on my throne, as I also overcame, and sat down with my Father on his throne.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 551,200 people living in Agri through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 2,662 neighbors who are far from you in Agri. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.
